actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Finance (without written report).
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Finance with amendment, S. Rept. 93-26.

official_title: A resolution authorizing two additional temporary professional staff members and two additional temporary clerical assistants for the Committee on Finance.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Authorizes the Committee on Finance, from March 1, 1973, through February 28, 1974, to employ two additional professional staff members and two additional clerical assistants, to be paid from the contingent fund of the Senate at rates of compensation to be fixed by the chairman.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing two additional temporary professional staff members and two additional temporary clerical assistants for the Committee on Finance.
